title: [FINISHED!] Salutations!  PS cordially invites you to a Gentleman's game...
body:
http://i.imgur.com/bvnnmCz.jpg
**PS - 3 / Community - 2**  Player Support takes the series!!!

Hey all,

Between the crazy Ezreal double-kills with his ults, the out of control Cho'gath fast stacking, or the unstopable Morgageddon Karma play, the URF games today were absolutely insane!  We couldn't have nearly as much fun with all of you playing and chatting with us on stream, so thank you so much for spending time with us! We don't have another even planned just yet, but we'll let everyone know once we do!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Game 5!**

GAME END!

http://i.imgur.com/RHXmw95.png

**MVP:** Eggstealer!  They couldn't dodge a wrench, so they couldn't dodge a ball!  {{champion:134}} 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Game 4!**

GAME END!

http://i.imgur.com/RHXmw95.png

**MVP:** Crysofear for the on nom's {{champion:31}}!!!  Feasting all day!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Game 3!**

GAME END!

http://i.imgur.com/RHXmw95.png

**MVP:** I Dukes! {{champion:67}}  For surviving the onsalaught that was Riot Morgageddon and coming out with the most kills!

----------------------------------------------------------------

**Game 2!**

GAME END!

http://i.imgur.com/bfILTp0.png

**MVP:** Strawbiri coming in with the plays {{champion:35}} .  Time to be featured on 'The Penta'?!?!  

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Game 1!**

GAME END!

http://i.imgur.com/bfILTp0.png


**MVP:** Hellioning!!!  Froggen...is that you?!?! {{champion:34}}

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Hey everyone!

We know that everyone was looking forward to the exciting turn based NURF combat, but Crit-Strike Animation Appreciation Day will have to wait! With the skumbag induction of ham into the servers, URF has been re-born and our fingers are cramped and raw from the amount of punishment inflicted on our keyboards. After icing down over the weekend, Player Support is challenging the community to some good ol’ fashioned URF games!

We’re planning on starting the insanity tomorrow, April 6th, from 3:00pm – 6:00pm PDT! Also, based on the feedback from our last event, we’ll have a stream for this one! It'll be fairly basic this time around, but we want your feedback on how we can improve it further!

[Here's the link to the stream!](http://www.twitch.tv/riotsupport)

In-between games, I will be updating this discussion with the Lobby Name and Password.  Once its filled, the game will start!

> [{quoted}](name=usul1202,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=EU7kydAW,comment-id=00090001,timestamp=2015-04-06T22:53:27.374+0000)
>
> Urgot to be kidden me

Haha, yeah. Didn't actually get a chance to play sadly, was too slow to join in :/ , but the first few matches were fun to watch.
Props to Strawbiri for getting a Penta as Shaco.  There were some mad jukes in that game.  Respect!
What is this about?  Is there going to be a contest on who can stack Cho'Gath's R first?  Will Phreak be shoutcasting?

My cleverness got away from me >.<  It is just a series of URF games we are going to be playing with everyone!  Although, who can get to be a fully stacked Cho'gath first does sound very interesting.....we totally need to do that :D
Will it be in custom games>tournament code?
It will be a Custom Game, but will not have a tournament code, just a normal password :D
what is the password and what is the name of the game in custom games?

> [{quoted}](name=zznoobtubesxx,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=EU7kydAW,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-04-06T14:49:05.463+0000)
>
> What is this about?  Is there going to be a contest on who can stack Cho'Gath's R first?  Will Phreak be shoutcasting?

Phreak had better be shoutcasting it.
how do you get the info to join?

Edit; I figured it out , for the other people that don't understand, Riot's hosting a custom game of NURF (A game mode that was "Supposed" to come out April 1st) and they're inviting the community to play with them! The Cho'gath thing kind of messed me up.
Ahhhh, that is definitely my fault. I took a stab at being TOO clever with it. Let me clean it up to make it more direct!
Same here
{{champion:32}} Will I be able to join the game?
Of course!  That is, if you are able to enter the lobby quick enough!  ^.^

Let see...I am on the east coast so that is around....6-9PM for me....I think I might visit.

{{champion:32}}  :)
ayy syndra OP, seriously though Im gonna go try gunblade gangplank now

Hey guys! I was Rumble in the bonus game. Thanks for playing with me! It was a real blast showing everyone how awesome a yordle with a powersuit can be.

that game 3 Karma rekt people
uhh how do you join in on this? lol Seems fun
Just wait for the thread to be updated with the Lobby Name and password after the game ends!  Enter the password and join as quickly as you can for a chance to get in!
OK thanks GJ BTW
Thanks for the game! Was fun. Enjoy playing bird whenever possible.
Was such a fun game, very back and forth!

lol well I'll watch the stream if I don't make it in
We hope that you'll be able to make it in!  We will have Rioters hanging out on our Stream channel as well, so you can always talk to them and keep them company! :)
:D
